thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com
thread.title: Matthew
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Matthew

author: Matthew
title: Matthew
text:
This was my first experience purchasing a vaporizer, but Planet of the Vapes website was EXTREMELY user friendly. I'm a UX Designer so I notice these things. I will definitely be back again when I need something else
Product: 10/10
Website: 10/10
Shipping: 10/10 (Order was shipped that same day)
